item.description:
The time frame for this meeting is limited to two hours (12:30 - 2:30 PM) due to other activities already scheduled in the room both before and after that time.
The Library has asked that we please park along the street rather than use their parking lot in order to leave the parking lot open for regular patrons.

The agenda will include:
1. Attendance sign-in and new member introductions.
2. Review of our trade experiment.
3. Suggestion period - quick review of the facilities and a vote on whether or not to continue meeting here or look for another venue, topics of interest for review and discussion, potential speakers, educational issues, other ideas, etc.
4. Have a group photo taken (assuming all are present).
5. Adjourn.

group.name: The Charlestown Investor's Business Daily Forum

item.name: The Charlestown Investor's Business Daily Forum September Meetup
